**Tender for Dental Expert and Consultant for Indigenous Services Canada (ISC)**

**Title:** Request for Proposal (RFP) - Dental Expert and Consultant for Indigenous Services Canada (ISC)

**Reference Number:** cb-845-96832753

**Amendment Number:** 4

**Solicitation Number:** 1000251793

**Publication Date:** January 26, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** February 20, 2024 (09:30:00)

**Notice Description:**
The Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is seeking a qualified dental expert and consultant to provide clinical and professional oversight to support the delivery of the Children's Oral Health Initiative (COHI) program. The COHI program targets First Nations children aged 0-12 years old, aiming to reduce the prevalence of early childhood caries disease. The expert will work with the COHI team to ensure quality dental care delivery and analyze oral health data for program improvement.

**Program Background:**
The COHI team employs 11 Community Dental Health Practitioners (CDHPs) who provide preventative dental services to 50 First Nations communities in Alberta. The program is delivered in primary school settings, daycares, preschools, and health centers.

**Required Services:**
The selected expert and consultant will be responsible for:

* Providing clinical and professional oversight to ensure the COHI program delivers quality dental care to First Nations clients and partners
* Analyzing oral health data for program improvement
* Collaborating with the COHI team to ensure program objectives are met

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The selection of the dental expert and consultant will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

The tender package and all additional information can be found on the Canada Buy Service website.
